property.name: new_install_user
property.value: INSERT INTO `stats_user`( `platform_dimension_id`, `date_dimension_id`, `new_install_users`, `created`) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `new_install_users` = ?

property.name: browser_new_install_user
property.value: INSERT INTO `stats_device_browser`( `platform_dimension_id`, `date_dimension_id`, `browser_dimension_id`, `new_install_users`, `created`) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `new_install_users` = ?

property.name: active_user
property.value: INSERT INTO `stats_user`( `platform_dimension_id`, `date_dimension_id`, `active_users`, `created`) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `active_users` = ?

property.name: browser_active_user
property.value: INSERT INTO `stats_device_browser`( `platform_dimension_id`, `date_dimension_id`, `browser_dimension_id`, `active_users`, `created` ) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `active_users` = ?
